definitions.definition: ( now chiefly in the plural ) A homosexual , especially a male homosexual.
( informal , often derogatory or ironic ) Gayness : the quality of being gay .
examples: Anti-gay persecution holds that you can pray the gay out of a person, or scare it out of them, or cajole it out of them.

definitions.definition: ( dialectal , obsolete ) Something which is bright or colorful, such as a picture or a flower.

main_definition: ( now chiefly in the plural ) A homosexual , especially a male homosexual.
